title: Constructivist-Based Science Curriculum Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic science education or relevant practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining lab settings with online platforms, providing collaborative tools via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more science curriculum design frameworks based on constructivist principles
Learners plan and execute learner-centered inquiry activities two or more times during actual science curriculum design processes
Learners develop project-based assessment tools and derive improvement plans with over 80% enhancement through peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
